participants.name: Mark Masterson
participants.title: Vice President Government Solutions at LearningMate

messages.message:
As someone who has worked in an EdTech startup for the last 3 years and read your job posting, I can tell you need me desperately.

- Brian Cullinan
Sounds like you are upgrading your software systems. Do you think it would be worth it to upgrade your recruiting and staffing process too?
Hmm now I know why this is taking so long.
